subject: Re: S4 Moxi Vivante Catalogue Updates
preview: Thanks Chris,  Should be fine to leave the current layout.  Will let you know if there are any further updates once I hear back from Irene.  Thank you,  Christine

full_threads.body:
Thanks Chris,

Should be fine to leave the current layout.

Will let you know if there are any further updates once I hear back from Irene.

Thank you,

Christine
additional +15 mins added to the momentum tracker.

Hi Christine, 

Thanks for clarifying.

Confirming the link has been updated. Please note, the layout doesn't allow for the text to be added. If you like to add text, we can look at adjusting the layouts.

https://staging-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/marketing-catalogue/

Hi @chris done updating DVD ISO link as shown in the screenshot
https://staging-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/moxi-v/

Time: +15mins

Hi @jaime another update from the client.

the screenshot shows the location of the update. My understanding is that we just replace the link: https://file.ac/cfr5CV_ufVk/

Hi Chris,

Sorry for the confusion, it will replace the link for the below which is under TrueFit fitting software.



Thank you,

Christine

Hi Christine, 

Sure thing, can you please provide specific instructions on where it is to feature. 

E.g.

Page: https://staging-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/moxi-v
Section: 4. TrueFit fitting software
Location: After 'ABCXYZ'

Thanks so much Chris!! I have just received the below, can we please add this in: TrueFit:
  • https://file.ac/cfr5CV_ufVk/
If it's possible to add text below, if not it's ok. New Features - TrueFit 5.5 updates include:
  • Support for Moxi V-312 and Stride V-PR hearing instruments (and Stride V-UP, which will be hidden until detected)
  • New soft sound reduction control
  • Ability to control HI synchronisation
  • Vivante and Blu firmware update
  • Updates to the getting started guide
  • And more!
Thank you, Christine
+1 hour added to momentum tracker.

Hi Christine, 

Confirming the updates are ready for your review: https://staging-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/marketing-catalogue/

Please let us know if there are any further updates.

Hi @chris done following updates

1. ✅ the 'Moxi V' image to be a packshot without numbers
2. ✅ the 'Moxi V' title to be 'Moxi V and Stride V'

https://staging-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/marketing-catalogue/

hi @jaime can you please update:

1. the 'Moxi V' image to be a packshot without numbers
2. the 'Moxi V' title to be 'Moxi V and Stride V'

The page is: https://staging-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/marketing-catalogue/

Hi Chris,

Hope you are well.

How are you going with the updates? Just need to send this tomorrow to the Product manager for review as well.

For the image on the hompage, can you please use the one without the numbers and add and Stride V to the button under it to say - Moxi V and Stride V?



Thank you,

Christine

Hi @chris following updates are done

✅ Professional resources - move 'Vivante Stride order form' next to 'Vivante Moxi order form'
✅ https://staging-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/moxi-v/

✅ Adjust the download button alignment

✅ Datasheets - 'Datasheet StrideV-PR' has a typo, should read 'Datasheet Stride V-PR'

✅ Datasheets - add item numbers for the follow data sheets - follow existing examples
✅ Datasheet Moxi V-312 > 027-6867-02
✅ Datasheet Stride V-PR > 027-6868-02

✅ update 'Moxi V' image to be a packshot

Time: +30mins

Hi @jaime in Glen's absence, I need your assistance with the following updates please. Glen appears to have completed all the customer requests except one along with some minor tweaks.

1. Professional resources - move 'Vivante Stride order form' next to 'Vivante Moxi order form'

2. Adjust the download button alignment 

3. Datasheets - 'Datasheet StrideV-PR' has a typo, should read 'Datasheet Stride V-PR'

4. Datasheets - add item numbers for the follow data sheets - follow existing examples
Datasheet Moxi V-312 > 027-6867-02
Datasheet Stride V-PR > 027-6868-02

5. https://staging-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/marketing-catalogue/ - update 'Moxi V' image to be a packshot, it can be found here:
https://sonova-my.sharepoint.com/:f:/p/nikki_ozeken/Ega8_PXtrPpClcMBRGkMN8gBZJLHoOnmEpELs2SrPPpOXA?email=support%40wolfiq.com.au&e=giDeWd

Hi Chris,

You should have all the ones highlighted in yellow on the attached.

I think the files I sent to Heath through a link were missed for upload - I have attached them all in my last email.

Thank you,

Christine

attachments.filename: UN S4 2023 Moxi V-312  Stride V-PR Launch Kit Item List with IK comments.xlsx

full_threads.body:
Hi Christine, 

Thanks for sending the updates through. 

Can you please resend the referenced spreadsheet? It was not attached to the email with the new attachments.

Sorry, forgot to add, please update heading to Moxi V and Stride V Marketing Catalogue



Thank you,

Christine

Hi Chris,

Also, please don't forget to update the image for Moxi V on the homepage to the family image shot and the Stride V image - might just need to name it Moxi V and Stride V on the homepage since the majority of the assets are combined.

Thank you,

Christine
@glen further updates from the client below, can you please action these?

Hi Chris, Thank you! Please find updates below under Professional:
  • Name order form currently on there as Vivante Moxi order form
  • Upload the attached Vivante Stride order form
  • Please update the Overview to the attached file and image tile
  • Upload the attached Troubleshoot Lithium Ion
  • Upload the attached Portfolio Summary
  • Upload the attached Bluetooth Pairing Troubleshoot
Please find updates below under Consumer:
  • Consumer pamphlet is still the old file Moxi V-RS, - please remove and update to attached file and image tile, name this Vivante consumer pamphlet
Updates for Datasheets:
  • The two attached datasheets are missing
Please ensure the ones in the email attached have been uploaded - spreadsheet included as checklist for all those in yellow. Thank you, Christine
45mins added to the momentum tracker
